section.title: User Mailing List
section.p: Search the the XMLBeans User List Archive for answers to your questions on using XMLBeans. Post questions, issues, feedback, on the using XMLBeans to this list.
Archives of the XMLBeans Users mailing list are available here in eybrowse.

section.title: Developer Mailing List
section.p: Use this mailing list for questions and/or issues related to development and coding of XMLBeans. You may want to search the archive or the XMLBeans FAQ before posting your question/feedback.
Archives of the XMLBeans Dev mailing list are available here in eybrowse.

section.title: CVS Mailing List
section.p: This list is used for CVS checkin emails and similar CVS type issues.
Archives of the XMLBeans CVS mailing list are available here in eybrowse.

section.title: Who we are
section.note: It is recommended that you use the mailing lists above to communicate about the XMLBeans project rather than emailing the committers directly.
The nospam. prefix on the email addresses above was put there as an attempt to thwart automatic email harvesting by spammers. To email someone on this list remove the nospam from the email address.
